Title: Enacts the lift our communities advertise locally (LOCAL) program
Summary: Enacts the lift our communities advertise locally (LOCAL) program which provides a tax credit on advertising for locally owned minority-owned and women-owned business enterprises, certified service-disabled veteran-owned business enterprises or a small business.
LawCode: Add Art 28 §§500 - 504, Ec Dev L; add §50, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the tax law in relation to enacting the lift our communities advertise locally (LOCAL) program; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
